IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'rawdata_nmdemostorage1_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [rawdata_nmdemostorage1_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://rawdata@nmdemostorage1.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'curateddata_nmdemostorage1_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [curateddata_nmdemostorage1_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://curateddata@nmdemostorage1.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Person.Person (
	[BusinessEntityID] int,
	[PersonType] nvarchar(4000),
	[NameStyle] bit,
	[Title] nvarchar(4000),
	[FirstName] nvarchar(4000),
	[MiddleName] nvarchar(4000),
	[LastName] nvarchar(4000),
	[Suffix] nvarchar(4000),
	[EmailPromotion] int,
	[AdditionalContactInfo] nvarchar(4000),
	[Demographics] nvarchar(4000),
	[rowguid] nvarchar(4000),
	[ModifiedDate] datetime2(7)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'landing/SQLServer1/Person/person.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [rawdata_nmdemostorage1_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

CREATE SCHEMA Person;

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE  Person.Person;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Person.Person 
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'enriched/Person/person_transformed.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [curateddata_nmdemostorage1_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
AS
SELECT
    [BusinessEntityID]
	,[PersonType]
	,[NameStyle]
	,[Title]
	,[FirstName]
	,[MiddleName]
	,[LastName]
	,CONCAT_WS(' ',  [FirstName], [MiddleName] , [LastName])  AS [FullName] 
	,[Suffix]
	,[EmailPromotion]
	,[AdditionalContactInfo]
	,[Demographics]
	,[rowguid]
	,[ModifiedDate]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://nmdemostorage1.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/landing/SQLServer1/Person/person.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GO;

DROP PROCEDURE transform_person;
CREATE PROCEDURE transform_person AS
BEGIN
	-- USE ServerlesssDB;
	-- Drop the table if it already exists
	IF EXISTS (
                SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables
                WHERE name = 'Person'
            )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE Person.Person;

	-- create ext table
	CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Person.Person 
		WITH (
		LOCATION = 'enriched/Person/person_transformed.parquet',
		DATA_SOURCE = [curateddata_nmdemostorage1_dfs_core_windows_net],
		FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
		)
	AS
	SELECT
		[BusinessEntityID]
		,[PersonType]
		,[NameStyle]
		,[Title]
		,[FirstName]
		,[MiddleName]
		,[LastName]
		,CONCAT_WS(' ',  [FirstName], [MiddleName] , [LastName])  AS [FullName] 
		,[Suffix]
		,[EmailPromotion]
		,[AdditionalContactInfo]
		,[Demographics]
		,[rowguid]
		,[ModifiedDate]
	FROM
		OPENROWSET(
			BULK 'https://nmdemostorage1.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/landing/SQLServer1/Person/person.parquet',
			FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
		) AS [result]
END;

EXEC transform_person;
